titles.title: A bill to abrogate the sovereign immunity of Indian tribes as a defense in inter partes review of patents.
A bill to abrogate the sovereign immunity of Indian tribes as a defense in inter partes review of patents.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This bill prohibits an Indian tribe from asserting sovereign immunity as a defense in an inter partes review of the validity of a patent.
